title: Act 2003 (No. 28 of 2003)), 3A (inserted by section 40 of the Act of 2001 and
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Oireachtas (Allowances) (Members and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Oireachtas (Allowances) (Members and 

Holders of Parliamentary and Certain Ministerial Offices) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited oireachtas (allowances) (members holder parliamentary certain ministerial offices) order 2025

title: Act 2003 (No. 28 of 2003)), 3A (inserted by section 40 of the Act of 2001 and
heading: 2. There is payable to a member of Dáil Éireann who holds or held a
text_raw:
2. There is payable to a member of Dáil Éireann who holds or held a 
position in Dáil Éireann specified in column (2) of Schedule 1 at any reference 
number, an allowance, in respect of the member’s duties as holder of that 
position, annually at the rate specified in column (3) of that Schedule opposite 
that reference number, in respect of any period, beginning on or after 29 
November 2024, and at the rate specified in column (4) of that Schedule opposite 
that reference number, in respect of any period, beginning on or after 1 March 
2025, during which the member held that position.
text_norm: 2 payable member dail eireann hold held position dail eireann specified column (2) schedule 1 reference number allowance respect member duty holder position annually rate specified column (3) schedule opposite reference number respect period beginning 29 november 2024 rate specified column (4) schedule opposite reference number respect period beginning 1 march 2025 member held position

title: Act 2003 (No. 28 of 2003)), 3A (inserted by section 40 of the Act of 2001 and
heading: 3. There is payable to a member of Seanad Éireann who holds or held a
text_raw:
3. There is payable to a member of Seanad Éireann who holds or held a 
position in Seanad Éireann specified in column (2) of Schedule 2 at any reference 
number, an allowance, in respect of the member’s duties as holder of that 
position, annually at the rate specified in column (3) of that Schedule opposite 
that reference number, in respect of any period, beginning on or after 12 
February 2025, and at the rate specified in column (4) of that Schedule opposite 
that reference number, in respect of any period, beginning on or after 1 March 
2025, during which the member held that position.
text_norm: 3 payable member seanad eireann hold held position seanad eireann specified column (2) schedule 2 reference number allowance respect member duty holder position annually rate specified column (3) schedule opposite reference number respect period beginning 12 february 2025 rate specified column (4) schedule opposite reference number respect period beginning 1 march 2025 member held position

title: Act 2003 (No. 28 of 2003)), 3A (inserted by section 40 of the Act of 2001 and
heading: 4. There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or held a
text_raw:
4. There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or held a 
position as a member of the Houses of the Oireachtas Commission, an 
allowance, in respect of the member’s duties as holder of that position, annually 
at the rate of €11,106, in respect of any period, beginning on or after 7 May 2025, 
during which the member held that position. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [289] 3

title: Act 2003 (No. 28 of 2003)), 3A (inserted by section 40 of the Act of 2001 and
heading: 5. There is payable to –
text_raw:
5. There is payable to – 

(a) Mary Butler, Minister of State at – 

(i) 

the Department of the Taoiseach, and 

(ii) 

the Department of Health, 

(b) Sean Canney, Minister of State at the Department of Transport, 

(c) Noel Grealish, Minister of State at the Department of Agriculture, 

Food and the Marine, and 

(d) Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the Department of 

Children, Disability and Equality, 

as the holders of those offices, respectively, who regularly attend meetings of 
the Government, an allowance, annually at the rate of – 

(i) 

€13,145, in respect of any period beginning on or after 23 
January 2025, and 

(ii) €13,408, in respect of any period beginning on or after 1 

March 2025.
text_norm: 5 payable - (a) mary butler minister state - (i) department taoiseach (ii) department health (b) sean canney minister state department transport (c) noel grealish minister state department agriculture food marine (d) hildegarde naughton minister state department child disability equality holder office respectively regularly attend meeting government allowance annually rate - (i) eur13 145 respect period beginning 23 january 2025 (ii) eur13 408 respect period beginning 1 march 2025

title: Act 2003 (No. 28 of 2003)), 3A (inserted by section 40 of the Act of 2001 and
heading: 6. There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or held the
text_raw:
6. There is payable to a member of the Oireachtas who holds or held the 
position of chairperson of an Oireachtas Committee specified in column (2) of 
Schedule 3 at any reference number, an allowance, in respect of the member’s 
duties as holder of that position, annually at the rate specified in column (3) of 
that Schedule opposite that reference number, in respect of any period, beginning 
on or after 7 May 2025, during which the member held that position.
text_norm: 6 payable member oireachtas hold held position chairperson oireachtas committee specified column (2) schedule 3 reference number allowance respect member duty holder position annually rate specified column (3) schedule opposite reference number respect period beginning 7 may 2025 member held position
